did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Gerald Goodrich "A Study of Labor Militancy in Central New York" Manuscript, 1990
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: "A Study of Labor Militancy in Central New York" by Gerald Goodrich, 1990.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of "A Study of Labor Militancy in Central New York," by Gerald Goodrich. The study examines three cases: Syracuse Building Trades Strike, 1913; Rome General Strike, 1919; and Syracuse Remington Rand Strike, 1936.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Gerald Goodrich "A Study of Labor Militancy in Central New York" Manuscript #5936m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
